WTF (wtfutil) is a terminal-based personal information dashboard designed to provide developers and tech professionals with at-a-glance access to important but infrequently needed stats and data. It offers a customizable TUI/CUI experience for monitoring various aspects of your digital life and workflow directly from your command line.

InnerTune is an Android application that provides a Material 3-themed client for YouTube Music. It allows users to play music from YouTube Music without ads, with background playback, offline downloads, synchronized lyrics, and various audio customization options.

This repository provides a modern, responsive, and customizable blog platform built with Next.js 14 and TypeScript. It features a beautiful UI with light/dark mode, smooth animations, Markdown/MDX support, and a tag system, designed for easy content creation and deployment.

Samarium is an open-source, Laravel-based business management system designed for small businesses. It offers integrated ERP, Point of Sale (POS), invoicing, customer management, and basic CMS features, all deployable via Docker.
